scripts.buildAndroidApk: npx cap build android --keystorepath ../askmeIntense.keystore --keystorepass 123456 --keystorealias alias_name --keystorealiaspass 123456 --androidreleasetype APK
scripts.buildAndroidAab: npx cap build android --keystorepath ../askmeIntense.keystore --keystorepass 123456 --keystorealias alias_name --keystorealiaspass 123456 --androidreleasetype AAB
scripts.signApk: apksigner sign --ks askmeIntense.keystore --ks-key-alias alias_name --ks-pass pass:123456 --key-pass pass:123456 android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-signed.apk
scripts.renameApk: sh -c 'VERSION_NAME=$(grep "versionName" android/app/build.gradle | sed -E "s/.*versionName \"(.*)\".*/\1/"); VERSION_NAME_UNDERSCORE=$(echo $VERSION_NAME | sed "s/\./_/g"); mv android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-signed.apk AskMeIntense_${VERSION_NAME_UNDERSCORE}.apk'
scripts.renameAab: sh -c 'VERSION_NAME=$(grep "versionName" android/app/build.gradle | sed -E "s/.*versionName \"(.*)\".*/\1/"); VERSION_NAME_UNDERSCORE=$(echo $VERSION_NAME | sed "s/\./_/g"); mv android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release-signed.aab AskMeIntense_${VERSION_NAME_UNDERSCORE}.aab'
scripts.generateApk:patch: rm -f AskMeIntense*.apk AskMeIntense*.aab && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:patch &&npm run buildAndroidApk && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signApk && npm run renameApk
scripts.generateApk:minor: rm -f AskMeIntense*.apk AskMeIntense*.aab && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:minor &&npm run buildAndroidApk && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signApk && npm run renameApk
scripts.generateApk:major: rm -f AskMeIntense*.apk AskMeIntense*.aab && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:major &&npm run buildAndroidApk && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signApk && npm run renameApk
scripts.generateAab:patch: rm -f AskMeIntense*.aab AskMeIntense*.apk && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:patch &&npm run buildAndroidAab && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signAab && npm run renameAab
scripts.generateAab:minor: rm -f AskMeIntense*.aab AskMeIntense*.apk && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:minor &&npm run buildAndroidAab && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signAab && npm run renameAab
scripts.generateAab:major: rm -f AskMeIntense*.aab AskMeIntense*.apk && npm run build && npm run capSync && npm run bumpVersion:major &&npm run buildAndroidAab && npm run updateIconApp && npm run signAab && npm run renameAab
scripts.preCommit: npm run format:fix && npm run lint && npm run bumpVersion:patch
